text: Malaysia competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. 23 competitors, all men, took part in 9 events in 5 sports. ==Athletics== ;Key * Note–Ranks given for track events are within the athlete's heat only * Q = Qualified for the next round * q = Qualified for the next round as a fastest loser or, in field events, by position without achieving the qualifying target * NR =
